sentences.english: The powers and functions of the district organizations and the method for their formation shall be prescribed by law.
sentences.chinese: 第九十八条区域组织的职权和组成方法由法律规定。

sentences.english: The crime of abusing the power and position is a superinduced crime of Criminal Law.
sentences.chinese: 滥用职权罪是《刑法》新增设的罪名。

sentences.english: Any judicial officer who abuses his power and commits the crime mentioned in the preceding paragraph shall be given a heavier punishment.
sentences.chinese: 司法工作人员滥用职权，犯前款罪的，从重处罚。

sentences.english: The article provides evidence support for Contingency Theory on Employee Turnover.
sentences.chinese: 为员工离职权变主义学说提供了证据支持。

sentences.english: Where a director encounters barriers when he normally exercises his power, he shall report it to the CIRC .
sentences.chinese: 董事正常行使职权遇到障碍，应当向中国保监会报告。

sentences.english: Don't take the advantage of your father's authority and force to take things from common people by force.
sentences.chinese: 你不要依仗你父亲的职权势力对百姓强取豪夺。

sentences.english: I feel this is meddlesome , if be proper exercise powers and authorities of office, what are you afraid of?
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这是好事，如果是正当行使职权，你怕什么？

sentences.english: and (6) To exercise other powers and functions as prescribed in the rules of procedure of the Legislative Council.
sentences.chinese: 立法会议事规则所规定的其他职权。

sentences.english: Naturally, this breeds corruption and abuse of power.
sentences.chinese: 自然，这孕育了腐败和滥用职权。

sentences.english: Authority was distributed among hundreds of petty leaders.
sentences.chinese: 职权由数百名小头头分掌。

sentences.english: President Medvedev also called for tough punishment against officers who will abuse their position.
sentences.chinese: 梅德奥杰夫亦对滥用职权的官员予以重罚。

sentences.english: C5.01 The responsibilities of this congregation are those necessary to fulfill its purposes.
sentences.chinese: 本堂会的职权是为著需要完成其目标而设立。

sentences.english: He presumed upon his position to find his daughter a nice job.
sentences.chinese: 他利用职权为其女儿找了一份好工作。

sentences.english: Bureau of investigation with wide and superior power is set to punish those members of corruption severely.
sentences.chinese: 设立职权广泛的贪污调查局，重惩腐败分子。

sentences.english: Chinese criminal procedure mode is a sup-inquisitorial one.
sentences.chinese: 我国现行刑事诉讼属于强职权主义诉讼模式。

sentences.english: He exploited his authority personal gratification .
sentences.chinese: 他利用职权来满足个人的私欲。

definition: to act as a substitute/to act on sb's behalf
